title: Potatoes stuffed with mushrooms and ham
directions: Wash potatoes and bake it in skins until doneness, cut in halves, remove the flesh with a spoon
Mix the flesh with fried mushrooms and ham cut into sticks.
Salt and pepper a filling, add chopped green and crumbed boiled yolk.
Lay out a filling in potato halves, sprinkle with cheese and oil; bake in preheated oven until golden
